title: MSN Messenger problems, anyone?
content:
Just thought to ask if anyone else has had problems with MSN lately? Some days ago (or yesterday, I can't remember!) it showed that I had only a few Keeners on my list, all the others had just disappeared, and now I can't log in at all.. Anyone else been sabotaged or something? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: MSN Messenger problems, anyone?
content:
Not for me, it works fine.____________
I have a boring signature.

...
Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site[/url].

title: Re: MSN Messenger problems, anyone?
content:

title: Re: MSN Messenger problems, anyone?
content:
Well, looks like I just got in -- all my contacts have disappeared and my name is "Keen" instead of what read there before. All the other settings seem to be intact, however. Oh well. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]
Edit: After being a few minutes logged in, some of my contacts reappeared, but most of them are still missing.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

content: doesn't bother me, i don't even use it anymoreRorie
